Title: Provides that testing positive for marihuana on a drug test shall not be determinative of whether a certified patient is performing his or her employment duties while impaired
Summary: Provides that testing positive for marihuana on a drug test shall not be determinative of whether a certified patient is performing his or her employment duties while impaired by a controlled substance or be the basis for a hiring decision or disciplinary action against such patient.
LawCode: Amd ยง3369, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to protections for the medical use of marihuana
